Text: I bought one of these to keep in my purse for times when I am out and about and need a snack or (because I am type 1 diabetic) when my blood sugar gets low. And I wanted something vegan and not full of junk and sugar.  This bar is wonderful.  I wasn't expecting anything since it is basically fruit and nuts, but was shocked when I bit into it.  Sweet but not too sweet.  Wonderful flavors.
